post:
Hi everyone, Erik from [Enoctus](https://www.enoctus.com) again. This time we'd like to share our limited time, LET exclusive offers which we hope you'll find appealing. 

**Features:**

**Unmetered 1GBPS** bandwidth in **London, Frankfurt, New York City and Los Angeles**.
NVMe SSDs
**KVM** based virtualisation
DDoS Protection
Instant setup

UK based support from Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm. Outsourced team available 24/7 when the UK team is off.
Phone support for managed customers
30 days [money back policy](https://www.enoctus.com/pages/moneyback)

Providers:
Choopa - United States, New York City Metro
Test IPv4: 108.61.5.89
Test file: http://speedtest.choopa.net/100MBtest.bin

CoreSite - United States, Los Angeles
Test IPv4: 172.96.140.74

Telehouse East - United Kingdom, London
Test IPv4: 185.17.27.98

Velia - Frankfurt, Germany
Test IPv4: 85.195.64.252
Test file: http://speedtest.frankfurt.de.velia.net/1000.data

For more information on our cloud VMs, [visit our website](https://www.enoctus.com/pages/linux-servers).



**THE OFFERS:**

**CloudServ-1024**

1024MB Dedicated RAM
1x vCPU
10GB SSD
Unmetered traffic @ 1GBPS
1x IPv4
KVM
$2.95 USD per month OR $26.55 USD per year **(3 months free)**
**Order link:** https://my.enoctus.co.uk/cart.php?currency=2&a=add&pid=71

**CloudServ-2048**

2048MB Dedicated RAM
1x vCPU
20GB SSD
Unmetered traffic @ 1GBPS
1x IPv4
KVM
$4.95 USD per month OR $44.55 USD per year **(3 months free)**
**Order link:** https://my.enoctus.co.uk/cart.php?currency=2&a=add&pid=72

**CloudServ-4096**

4096MB Dedicated RAM
2x vCPU
30GB SSD
Unmetered traffic @ 1GBPS
1x IPv4
KVM
$6.95 USD per month OR $62.55 USD per year **(3 months free)**
**Order link:** https://my.enoctus.co.uk/cart.php?currency=2&a=add&pid=73


If you have any questions, contact sales at https://www.enoctus.co.uk/pages/support. Live chat and phone support is on from 9am to 6pm UK time.

Should you have any concerns, feel free to have a look at our [previous thread](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/157371/enoctus-com-windows-linux-vps-5-locations-ddos-protected-instant-setup-1gbps-3-95-p-m/).

-Erik
